name: dato-cms-multilang

scripts.build: npm run build:datocms && npm run build:hugo
scripts.start: dato check && concurrently -p "[{name}]" -c "blue,red,green,yellow" -k -n hugo,dato "npm run start:hugo" "npm run start:datocms"

description: This repo contains a working static website written with [Hugo](http://gohugo.io/), integrated with content coming from a [DatoCMS](https://www.datocms.com) administrative area.
